description:
On February 20 new footage was released showing President Biden tripping on stairs leading up to Air Force One, causing another round of speculation on the 81 year old's vitality.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden is recorded tripping on a staircase again by 11:59 PM ET, Sunday, February 25, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". If no such footage is released by the end date, this market will immediately resolve to "No."

Photographs or announcements will not be considered toward this market's resolution. Only recorded video of Biden tripping on a staircase will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution.

The video must be original and not manipulated or digitally altered to mislead the viewer. Edited videos, deepfakes, or any form of manipulated media will not be considered valid for the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the video(s) in question, verified by a consensus of credible reporting and/or Biden and his representatives.

markets.question: Will Biden trip on a staircase again this week?
